fplr 1.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • fplr quickstart

Get comprehensive data on a player

fpl_get_player_detailed.Rd

Retrieve detailed data for a player in the current FPL season, obtained via the element summary endpoint.

fpl_get_player_detailed(player_id, convert_prices = TRUE)

Arguments

player_id

player's ID (id field from fpl_get_player_all output).
convert_prices

Convert player price-related metrics to familiar denominations (TRUE by default)

Value

a list

Examples

fpl_get_player_detailed(player_id = 3)
#> $history_past
#>     id season_name element_code start_cost end_cost total_points minutes
#> 1 2641     2010/11        51507        6.0      5.9           85    2617
#> 2 3383     2011/12        51507        6.0      5.8          103    2871
#> 3 4059     2012/13        51507        5.5      5.3           88    1675
